Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that Donald Trump posed as an anonymous "Nevada poll worker" on Laura Ingraham's show when the video is actually a satirical creation by Nick Lutsko.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence or proof provided to substantiate the claim that Donald Trump posed as a poll worker.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the anonymous poll worker in the video is Donald Trump without any concrete evidence.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation that the voice in the video is not actually Donald Trump, as stated by the expert who compared it to an April interview where Trump made similar comments.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the video is not authentic and was created as satire.
Understate: There is no evidence of understating bias in the claim.
Falters at times: There is no evidence of the claim faltering at times bias in the claim.
